backend/main.mo: Motoko actor storing submitted messages with timestamps and exposing submitMessage and getAllMessages APIs.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to modified frontend files and related metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and dark‑mode OKLCH variable definitions establishing global color tokens and styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts, metadata, dark mode, and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component that renders the single‑page portfolio.
frontend/src/components/PortfolioBackgro: Static aurora‑style gradient background with layered blurred orbs for depth.
frontend/src/components/Reveal.tsx: Scroll‑reveal wrapper applying motion‑safe fade/translate animations using useScrollReveal.
frontend/src/content/profilePhoto.ts: Exports PROFILE_PHOTO_PATH and documents where to place the profile image file.
frontend/src/features/contact/ContactFor: Contact form handling input, validation, submit flow, and success/error alerts.
frontend/src/features/contact/useContact: Hook that sends messages to the backend and manages submission state.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches backend actors based on Internet Identity state and manages refetching.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Authentication context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, state, and persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a React Query hook that fetches all messages from the backend actor when available.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollReveal.ts: Implements an intersection‑observer based hook that reveals elements on scroll, respecting reduced‑motion preferences.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus extensive CSS variables and custom gradient/text utilities for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/PortfolioSinglePage.t: Renders the full portfolio page with scroll‑activated navigation, section scrolling logic, and UI components.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins for animations and typography.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the portfolio site's purpose, architecture notes, existing features, and requirements.
